## CallControlFactory.createCallControl() method

Creates an [ICallControl](./jabra-js.icallcontrol.md) instance for a given device, enabling call control functionality.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createCallControl(device: IDevice): Promise<ICallControl>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  device | [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) | the device you wish to execute call control functionality on. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ICallControl](./jabra-js.icallcontrol.md)<!-- -->&gt;

an Observable which emits a new [ICallControl](./jabra-js.icallcontrol.md)<!-- -->.
